mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT
C.CO_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.CO_CD) AS CO_NM,
SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 0, 6) AS ETRDPS_YM , SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 0, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 5,2) CLOSE_YM , C.TAXIVC_COPRT , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.TAXIVC_COPRT) AS TAXIVC_COPRT_NM , C.CLNT_CD , BM02.CLNT_NM , BM02.CRN AS CRN_NO , C.PRJCT_CD , (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 SD05 WHERE SD05.PRJCT_CD = C.PRJCT_CD ) AS PRJCT_NM , C.PRDT_GRP , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.PRDT_GRP) AS PRDT_GRP_NM , SELL_PAY_DIV_CD , NVL(CLMN_DIV_CD,SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD) AS SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD , NVL(PMNT_MTD_CD,SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD) AS SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD , SELL_VAT_CD , NVL(CLMN_DAY,SELL_CLMN_DAY) AS SELL_CLMN_DAY , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(BM02.SELL_PAY_DIV_CD) AS SELL_PAY_DIV_NM , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(NVL(CLMN_DIV_CD,BM02.SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD)) AS SELL_CLMN_DIV_NM , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(NVL(PMNT_MTD_CD,BM02.SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD)) AS SELL_PMNT_MTD_NM , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(BM02.SELL_VAT_CD) AS SELL_VAT_NM , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.BASIS_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) BASIS_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_CLMN_AMT, 0))) CLMN_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_TOT_AMT, 0))) TOT_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.TRMEND_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) TRMEND_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.BASIS_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) BFR_BASIS_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_CLMN_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM1_CLMN_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_TOT_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM1_TOT_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.TRMEND_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM1 , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -2), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.BASIS_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) BASIS_CREDIT_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -2), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_CLMN_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM2_CLMN_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -2), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.CELL_TOT_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM2_TOT_AMT , SUM(DECODE(C.CLOSE_YM, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -2), 'YYYYMM') ,NVL(C.TRMEND_CREDIT_AMT, 0))) CLOSE_YM2
, F_CREDIT_LOAN_PRDTGRP('T',C.CLNT_CD,C.CO_CD,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-',''),0) AS CRDT_LMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_NON_RECV_AMT(C.CLNT_CD,C.CO_CD,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS NON_RECV_AMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_UNSETL_BIL_AMT(C.CLNT_CD,C.CO_CD,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS UNSETL_BIL_AMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_NON_PAY_AMT(C.CLNT_CD,C.CO_CD,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS NON_PAY_AMT , F_CREDIT_LOAN_PRDTGRP('C',C.CLNT_CD,C.CO_CD,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-',''),0) AS CRDT_LOAN
, F_CREDIT_LOAN_PRDTGRP('T',C.CLNT_CD, '' ,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-',''),0) AS CRDT_LMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_NON_RECV_AMT(C.CLNT_CD, '' ,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS NON_RECV_AMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_UNSETL_BIL_AMT(C.CLNT_CD, '' ,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS UNSETL_BIL_AMT , F_CREDIT_PRDTGRP_NON_PAY_AMT(C.CLNT_CD, '' ,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-','')) AS NON_PAY_AMT , F_CREDIT_LOAN_PRDTGRP('C',C.CLNT_CD, '' ,C.PRDT_GRP,REPLACE(#{baseDt},'-',''),0) AS CRDT_LOAN
FROM TB_AR07M01 C LEFT JOIN TB_BM02M01 BM02 ON BM02.CLNT_CD = C.CLNT_CD LEFT JOIN TB_SD05M01 SD05 ON SD05.PRJCT_CD = C.PRJCT_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND SELPCH_CD = #{selpchCd}
AND C.CLOSE_YM BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), -2), 'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{baseDt}, '-', ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM')
AND BM02.CLNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{clntNm} ||'%'
AND C.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND C.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
AND C.TAXIVC_COPRT = #{taxivcCoprt}
AND C.PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp}
GROUP BY
C.CO_CD,
C.TAXIVC_COPRT, BM02.CLNT_NM, C.CLNT_CD , BM02.CRN, C.PRJCT_CD, C.PRDT_GRP, SELL_PAY_DIV_CD, NVL(CLMN_DIV_CD,SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD), NVL(PMNT_MTD_CD,SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD), SELL_VAT_CD, NVL(CLMN_DAY,SELL_CLMN_DAY) ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex} ORDER BY
CO_CD,
CLNT_NM, PRDT_GRP, PRJCT_CD
